thread.section_title: DogVacay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DogVacay | dogvacay.com | 3 of 137
thread.title: Jordan Knipe

author: Jordan Knipe
title: Jordan Knipe
text: We are very happy with both the company and the individual who provided the service of watching our dog while we were away. We felt protected by the company if anything should happen to our beloved dog and also very happy with the individual who watched him. Dogvacay obviously does a great job vetting its employees and we will definitely be using this service in the future.
